original_title: CID arrests seven youth with over Rs.70 million near a hotel in Colombo
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Criminal Investigation Department has arrested seven youth with over Rs.70 million, near a high-end hotel in Colombo.
Sri Lanka Police said they were arrested during a search operation, based on a tip-off.
The CID has also seized two cars and a pistol in their possession.
